name: Broken Delivery Service
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2020
An event that challenges developers to create a game in 48 hours. The 2020 year's theme was "Out of Control".

Broken Delivery Service
A 2D plataform that uses simple plataform challenges that become a nightmare when the player has no control over the jump timing.
Following the theme of the Jam, the game removes the player's control over the character jump.

Story 
In a post apocalyptic world, a father sents a robot to deliver a message to his daughter. The outdated model has issues in his jump circuit, difficulting the path to the girl.

Without other option, the girl herself controls the robot to her bunker, avoiding traps that were once placed to protect her.

Last Minute Team
